snippet: Ariel Castro, accused of holding three women captive in his home for a decade, was charged with hundreds of added counts, including rape, kidnapping and aggravated murder.
abstract: Ariel Castro, man accused of holding three women captive in his Cleveland home for a decade, is charged with hundreds of added counts; 977-count indictment includes charges of rape, kidnapping and two counts of aggravated murder.
lead_paragraph: Ariel Castro, accused of holding three women captive in his home for a decade, was charged with hundreds of added counts, including rape, kidnapping and aggravated murder.
